result.arabic_text: وَعَدَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ وَٱلۡمُؤۡمِنَٰتِ جَنَّٰتٖ تَجۡرِي مِن تَحۡتِهَا ٱلۡأَنۡهَٰرُ خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَا وَمَسَٰكِنَ طَيِّبَةٗ فِي جَنَّٰتِ عَدۡنٖۚ وَرِضۡوَٰنٞ مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ أَكۡبَرُۚ ذَٰلِكَ هُوَ ٱلۡفَوۡزُ ٱلۡعَظِيمُ
result.translation: 72.Yalli lab moominiin kee say moominiin jannootay weeqaytitte guba как gexxal xagnise usun tet addal waarak, meqe dabooqay qadni deqsitta jannootah addal tanih ken xagnise, wohuk nabuk raqtam Yallak leedaa kee kacanu geyaanama, too edde yabne niqmoota is kaxxa saami maqaanee kee maffaafa.
